name: Notion Time Tracker
description: This is not a disposable template.This is an integrated, everlasting system.To all the MFM fans out there, remember this?Well, we designed a system that allows you to track every minute of your time & display the results in an elegant Notion dashboard. After building the Google Calendar to Notion 2-way sync automation, you'll be able to see the exact repartition of your time between Work, Life, Relationships & Sleep (categories can be added & modified).On top of that, you also have t
features: 2-way sync automation between Google Calendar & Notion (Instructions)Get all your Google Calendar events into NotionPush events from Notion to Google CalendarUpdate events & automatic sync; Get all your Google Calendar events into Notion; Push events from Notion to Google Calendar; Update events & automatic sync; Automatic time tracking & repartition system; Habits, Mood, & Sleeping scoring system
